thread.title: Volkswagen Has Been Cheating on Pollution Tests, Is in Deep Trouble
thread.title_full: Volkswagen Has Been Cheating on Pollution Tests, Is in Deep Trouble - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Volkswagen Has Been Cheating on Pollution Tests, Is in Deep Trouble
text: Last Friday, the US Environmental Protection Agency published a report accusing Volkswagen of cheating on air pollution tests and, consequently, being in violation of the country's Clean Air Act. Over the next few days, things only went downhill. Right about now, the automotive manufacturer is in deep, deep trouble. Karma, right? How it all started In its September 18 report, the US Environmental Protection Agency accuses Volkswagen of selling rigged... Â»
